subject: Re: Story House's website – Can We Help?
preview: Hi Andy,  Thanks for this - the Pathzero column has been updated, so please extend my thanks to Glen!  I have also finalised the detail for the two Privatus Capital Fund Investments that require addin

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy,

Thanks for this - the Pathzero column has been updated, so please extend my
thanks to Glen!

I have also finalised the detail for the two Privatus Capital Fund
Investments that require adding. I have also included the asset's websites
for ease of ascertaining logos.

*Privatus Capital Fund Investments*

- Boss Engineering
- Boss Engineering designs and manufacturers agricultural machinery
and transport equipment, servicing the agricultural and transport sectors
- Privatus invested in Boss Engineering alongside Alceon in a
majority position, valuing the business at $170m
- https://bosseng.com.au/
- Foil Drive
- Foil Drive is the producer of the world's leading foil assist
technology, used in the fast-growing water sport, foiling
- Privatus invested in Foil Drive alongside Glow Capital Partners in
a minority position
- https://foildrive.com/


Many thanks,

Finlay

*Finlay Campbell*
Analyst

*M *+61 416 718 923
*E *finlay@privatuscp.com <zara@privatuscp.com>



------------------------------
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2025 3:56 PM
To: Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com>; Daphne Bautista <
daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Story House's website – Can We Help?

Hi Finlay,

For sure - our team is on this and will take care of those things.

I'll send you that video on Story House shortly.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 3:35 PM Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com>
wrote:

Hi Andy,

If you could also add these two assets to the Princeville Capital page on
the website, I would very much appreciate it.

*Princeville Capital - Assets to Add*

- Day One - Singapore-based data center company developing and operating
next-generation digital infrastructure across Asia-Pacific
- https://dayonedc.com/
- Claroty - Cybersecurity company providing advanced protection for
cyber-physical systems across industrial, healthcare and enterprise
platforms
- https://claroty.com/


Many thanks,

Finlay


*Finlay Campbell*
Analyst

*M *+61 416 718 923
*E *finlay@privatuscp.com <zara@privatuscp.com>



------------------------------
From: Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2025 2:54 PM
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Story House's website – Can We Help?

Hey Andy,

One current mark-up which it would be great to action - can we get the
pathzero relationship column in the same format as the other three columns?

Please find the page below.


Let me know if this doesn't make sense.

Many thanks,

Finlay

*Finlay Campbell*
Analyst

*M *+61 416 718 923
*E *finlay@privatuscp.com <zara@privatuscp.com>



------------------------------
From: Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2025 2:48 PM
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Story House's website – Can We Help?

Hey Andy,

That would be great - thanks!

In the meantime, I am still aligning with the team on the exact wording for
the final website updates before they go live.

I will be able to get back to you soon with an update.

Many thanks,

Finlay

*Finlay Campbell*
Analyst

*M *+61 416 718 923
*E *finlay@privatuscp.com <zara@privatuscp.com>



------------------------------
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, June 23, 2025 2:19 PM
To: Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com>
Subject: Story House's website – Can We Help?

Hi Finlay,

We were looking at your investment portfolio.

Story House has got a bunch of website issues that would be limiting their
search visibility and online leads.

Would it be helpful if we recorded a quick Loom video you could pass to
their team to get this tidied up?

Thanks,
Andy
--

Andy Crebar

Director
